I've deployed an initial set of tests for the FAST Security IG: https://inferno-dev.healthit.gov/

Currently these only test the discovery portion of the workflow. Please reach out to me if you have any feedback on the tests.

Thanks @Stephen MacVicar - we're trying to assemble the IG completion info for the report out. Would you say Sever Metadata has been implemented for both client & server then (client validates server metadata), or just one or the other?
I'm not completely sure what you mean by implementing for both client and server. It verifies a server's metadata.

If you want the test tool to count as an implementer of the IG, it seems reasonable to say it's a Client that validates Server Metadata (as a client would) but I can understand if you do not wish to consider Inferno "a FHIR client" & not list it as an implementer.

it seems reasonable to say it's a Client that validates Server Metadata

Yes, that is how I would characterize it. For now it's just verifying the server metadata, but in the future it should be able to do the registration/auth workflows as well.
By the way @Stephen MacVicar please disregard a question I initially asked in this post- miscommunication re: endpoint, I see the issue now. Thanks!
